#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <algorithm>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--){
    	long long a, b, c, k, D;
    	double ans, ans1, ans2;
    	scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld", &a, &b, &c, &k);
    	c -= k;
    	D = (b * b) - (4 * a * c);
    	if(c>=k){
    		printf("0\n");
    	}
    	else{
    		ans1 = (double)(-b) + sqrt(D);
    		ans1 /= (double)(2 * a);
    			ans = ans1;
    		if((ans - (int)ans) == 0)
    			printf("%d\n", (int)ans);
    		else
    			printf("%d\n", (int)ans + 1);
    	}
    }
	return 0;
}
